Articles.Content: I am trying to make a large plane with lots of stuff on it (pics are attached). It falls apart the moment I try to launch. Help?
attach as much supports as you can to ensure it doesn\'t break under its own weight

In my experience sometimes the problem was that when placing parts in weird configurations that were not meant to be by the designer some collision boxes freak up and cause explosions. Try distancing the parts by using lateral decouplers for example.
